description: Search hotels by city, state, country, or geolocation and explore detailed property info. Check live availability, compare rates and room types, and review boards and promotions. Create ready-to-book links with preselected rooms, rates, supplements, and optional guest details.

capabilities.name: get_availability
capabilities.description: Search hotel room availability and pricing for specific dates and occupancy.

capabilities.name: get_calendar
capabilities.description:
Search hotel calendar availability and pricing.

    **When to use**: When specific dates are not available, use this to suggest closest available dates or alternatives

capabilities.name: get_booking_additional_services
capabilities.description:
Get additional services available for a booking selection.

    **When to use**: After user selects a booking option from availability search, to get additional services available for that option.

capabilities.name: get_booking_url
capabilities.description: Generate booking url with preselected room, rate, meal plan, supplements. If no room_preselection is provided, it will generate a booking url showing available options.

capabilities.name: search_hotels_by_area
capabilities.description: Search for hotels in a specific area

capabilities.name: search_hotels_by_geo_location
capabilities.description: Search for hotels near GPS coordinates within a specified radius, sorted by distance.

capabilities.name: get_all_hotels
capabilities.description: Get paginated list of all hotels by the System

capabilities.name: get_hotel_by_name
capabilities.description: Retrieve hotels based on distance-search algorithms
